decision_conditions: 2.  The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with drawing number 19 BGAR SL01 Rev. B

of Planning Permission Ref: 35924/APP/2023/1358 dated 01-08-2023 and the submitted plans, drawing numbers 1421-C-203, 1421-C-204, 1421-C-205, 1421-C-300 and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012), Part 2 (2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, which is incorporated in the above revised approved plans condition, all other approved plans and conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 35924/APP/2023/1358 dated 01-08-2023 must be discharged/adhered to as per the planning permission.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 35924/APP/2023/1358, dated 01-08-2023 (Demolition of an existing garage. Erection of a two storey, 1-bed end-of-terrace dwelling and erection of two storey rear extension.) to approve fenestration changes, internal layout changes and the retention of the existing single storey rear extension at No.174.
